entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 20. POP 60%
